entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sheet Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 p.m. ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malay Falls 5:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
Temperature: 4.8°C
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
